title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

The left's stupid, ignorant, angry Marxist counterrevolutionaries have everybody cowed. Actual Guardian news story rages against skyscrapers for being phallic signs of toxic masculinity. There's no demand for the book by Trump's disgruntled niece who alleges -- without evidence -- that his father abused him. Trump niece book will bomb, in part because people expect you to keep family problems in the family. Jason Whitlock is one of the few willing to call out Black Lives Matter as radicals, rips NFL for caving and insulting fan base. Twitter is not America. Caller: Even if Trump was abused, that doesn't mean you cannot succeed.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

If Mary Trump thought her uncle was such a danger, why didn't she speak up in 2015? COVID deaths are way down, so the media touts "cases." Hydroxychloroquine is working. After all the Trump hate, it turns out hydroxychloroquine is effective to prevent the novel coronavirus. Sen. Scott Jensen, Republican of Minnesota, dares expose the government for falsely claiming COVID-19 deaths. You dare not speak out against the regime. Not a single bit of optimism about COVID-19, just never-ending pessimism to make Trump look bad. Guess what? Now it's proven that these anti-American protests spread the virus, says the NY Times. Callers dismiss disgruntled Trump niece's book as latest in endless attacks dating back to Access Hollywood. "Trump can win in 2020 by doing this one thing."

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Trump can win by casting himself as the final line in defense of the American way of life, and not getting into elder abuse of Joe Biden. Stunning chart from Europe's CDC shows COVID deaths petering out, but cases rising in accordance with testing. Little child killed in Atlanta by autonomous zone rioters. Study: Easily offended people are bad employees, miserable. Mixed-race QB Mahomes somehow gets $500M contract in white supremacist America. Caller laments CEOs going along with abolishing the cops and asks why.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
